profile.title: Iphrofayela Yomsebenzisi
profile.mustLogin: Kufanele ungene ngemvume ukuze ubuke izilungiselelo.
profile.importFailed: Yehlulekile ukungenisa ukhiye (iphasiwedi ayilungile noma ifayela lonakele).
profile.keysRotated: Kubunjwe kabusha umbhangqwana wokhiye futhi kukhushulwe ukhiye womphakathi.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Ukhiye wakho oyimfihlo awusoze washiya lomshini. Khipha ikhophi evikelwe ngephasiwedi ukuze uyibuyisele komunye umshini.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Usekuhlelo Lwamahhala—sebenzisa izinketho ezisheshayo zeLanga/Inkanyezi ngezansi. Thuthukisa ukuze uvule izindikimba eziningi.
profile.backupDesc: Yakha izipele ezivikelwe ngephasiwedi zokhiye bakho, bese ubuyisela komunye umshini ukuze uvumelanise.
profile.followHint: Izindaba zabo zizovela ku-Feed olandelayo uma bethumela kubalandeli (noma Obala).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Dlulisela izingcingo nezimeseji ezingenayo kufoni noma i-imeyili eqinisekisiwe. Ezikhishwayo zingakhombisa inombolo yakho ye-Chatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Khetha okungenani indawo eyodwa (ifoni noma i-imeyili).
profile.errQuietHours: Amahora okuthula kumele abe phakathi kuka-0 no-23.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha umbhalo noma ikamelo lengxoxo ukuze uqale

status.filesNote: Kuze kube amafayela ayi-5. Iphelelwa amahora angu-24 ngokuzenzakalela.

auth.headline: Imiyalezo evikelekile, yomhlaba wonke enokuhumusha okusheshayo
auth.description: Ukubethela kokuphela kuya ekupheleni, ukuhumusha okunamandla kwe-AI, imilayezo enyamalalayo, nokushaya/ingxoxo yevidiyo.

feature.privacy: Imfihlo kuqala. Idatha yakho, ukulawula kwakho.

auth.desktopTip: Use-desktop? Skena ngefoni yakho ukuze uthole uhlelo lokusebenza.
auth.subhead: Imiyalezo eyimfihlo, ebethelwe, futhi ehumushiwe — ngokushesha.
auth.tip: Ungasebenzisa i-Chatforia kunoma iyiphi idivayisi — noma ulande uhlelo lokusebenza ukuze uthole okuhlangenwe nakho okungcono.
auth.scanHint: Skena ukuze ulande uhlelo lokusebenza noma uvule kubhrawuza.

press.title: Imithombo yezindaba
press.boilerplateText: I-Chatforia iwumyalezo ovikelekile onokuhumusha okusheshayo ne-E2E encryption, oklanyelwe ukwenza izingxoxo zomhlaba wonke zibe yimfihlo futhi zibe lula.

careers.title: Amathuba Emisebenzi
careers.intro: Singethimba elincane elakha umyalezo ovikelekile, womhlaba wonke. Uma unendaba nokubethela, ukufinyeleleka, ne-UX emnandi, siyajabula ukuzwa ngawe.
careers.openRoles: Izikhundla ezivuliwe: Ubunjiniyela (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Umkhiqizo, Ukusekela.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Chatforia
about.description: I-Chatforia iwumyalezo ovikelekile, onezilimi eziningi, onokubethelwa kokuphela kuya ekupheleni, ukuhumusha okusheshayo, nokushaya/ingxoxo yevidiyo. Umgomo wethu ulula: ukusiza abantu baxhumane—bephephile, bemfihlo, futhi ngaphesheya kwezilimi.

values.access: Ukufinyelela kubo bonke: Ukuhumusha okuzenzakalelayo kwezilimi eziyi-100+.

about.howDescription: Imilayezo ibethelwa kudivayisi yakho ngaphambi kokuba iphume. Ukuhumusha, izipele, nokuvumelanisa amadivayisi kwakhelwe ukunciphisa lokho amasiza ethu angakubona.

advertise.title: Khangisa nge-Chatforia
advertise.description: Finyelela kubasebenzisi abangene kakhulu engxoxweni ngezikhala ezihloniphayo, eziphephile kumkhiqizo. Sinikeza amabhanela ezindaweni ezibonakala kakhulu, ubunikazi, kanye nezikhangiso zethu zangaphakathi. Ababhalisile be-Premium abababoni izikhangiso.

adsense.withPubId: Njengamanje sikhonza izikhangiso nge-Google AdSense. Uma ungathanda ukusihlosisa nge-Google Ads, sebenzisa i-publisher ID {{pubId}} bese ucele i-managed placement kumayunithi ethu angezansi. Kukhona nobunikazi bokuqondile—sebenzisa ifomu.
adsense.noPubId: Njengamanje sikhonza izikhangiso nge-Google AdSense. Kukhona nobunikazi bokuqondile—sebenzisa ifomu ngezansi.

why.highSession: Imvamisa ephezulu yokuvakasha nesikhathi eside sokuhlala ku-UI yengxoxo
why.brandSafe: Amafomethi aphephile kumkhiqizo; ukunciphisa imvamisa okuhloniphayo
why.deals: Izivumelwano eziqondile noma ngezinhlelo ze-AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Siyabonga! Umbuzo wakho usendleleni. Sizokuphendula maduzane.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvulwa umxoxi we-imeyili wakho ukuze uthumele umbuzo…

upgrade.title: Thuthukisa
upgrade.subtitle: Vula uhlelo olufanele wena: susa izikhangiso nge-Plus, noma uthole zonke izici zethu ezinamandla nge-Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Ukuqala
gettingStarted.subtitle: Umuva ku-Chatforia? Lo mhlahlandlela osheshayo ubonisa izisekelo ukuze uqale emizuzwini embalwa.

alert.text: Lo mhlahlandlela uzokhula njengoba sethulwa izici ezintsha. Uma kukhona okushodayo, sazise nge-

section2.title: 2) Qala imiyalezo
section2.item1: Dala i-DM noma Iqembu bese uthumela umyalezo wokuqala.
section2.item2: Sebenzisa ukuhumusha okusheshayo ukuze uxhumane ngezilimi eziyi-100+.
section2.item3: Zama imilayezo enyamalalayo ne-zitifiketi zokufunda ku-Iphrofayela → Imfihlo.

section3.title: 3) Hamba phambili
section3.item2Part1: Xhumanisa amadivayisi angeziwe futhi usethe izisipesheli ezibethelwe ku-

account.q: Ngidala kanjani noma ngibuyise i-akhawunti yami?
account.a: Landa uhlelo noma sebenzisa iwebhu, chofoza “Dala i-akhawunti”, uqinisekise i-imeyili/ifoni. Ukuvuselela, sebenzisa “Ukhohliwe iphasiwedi”.

privacy.a: Yebo. Imilayezo nezingcingo zibethelwe kokuphela kuya ekupheleni ngokuzenzakalela. Wena nomamukeli kuphela eningayifunda.

translate.a: Vula “Humusha ngokuzenzakalela” ku-Izilungiselelo → Ukubukeka & Ulimi. Sihumusha kudivayisi lapho kusekelwa, kungenjalo ngamasevisi avikelekile anemininingwane encane.

contact.a: Sixhumane ku-support@chatforia.com. Faka izithombe-skrini nenguqulo yohlelo.

contact.title: Xhumana Nathi
contact.errorSend: Ayikwazanga ukuthumela. Sicela uthumele i-imeyili ku-support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Le Nqubomgomo Yemfihlo ichaza ukuthi i-Chatforia (“thina”, “thina”) iqoqe kanjani, isebenzise, futhi yabelane kanjani ngolwazi uma usebenzisa izinhlelo zethu namasevisi. Sihlela i-Chatforia ukuze sinciphise idatha esingayibona.

infoWeCollect.title: Ulwazi esiluqoqa
infoWeCollect.account: Ulwazi lwe-akhawunti (isb., i-imeyili/ifoni) ukwakha nokuvikela i-akhawunti yakho.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Okokuhlola/ukusetshenziswa njengezinhlelo eziwile, uhlobo lwedivayisi, noma i-analytics elula yokuthuthukisa ukusebenza.

sharing.title: Ukwabelana
sharing.body: Asithengisi idatha yomuntu siqu. Singabelana ngedatha elinganiselwe nabenzi bokucubungula (isb., izaziso zokucindezela, i-analytics) ngaphansi kwezivumelwano eziqinile.

rights.title: Amalungelo akho
rights.body: Ngokuya ngesifunda sakho (isb., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ungacela ukufinyelela, ukulungisa, ukususa, noma ukuphuma kwezinye izinqubo. Xhumana: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ukugcinwa kwedatha & ukuphepha
retention.body: Sigcina kuphela okudingekayo ukuze sisebenze bese sisebenzisa izindinganiso zokuphepha zemboni. Okuqukethwe kwe-E2E asikwazi ukukuhumusha.

children.title: Izingane
children.body: I-Chatforia ayiqondiswa ezinganeni ezingaphansi kuka-13 (noma njengoba kudingwa umthetho wendawo yakho).

changes.title: Izinguquko
changes.body: Sizobeka izibuyekezo lapha futhi siguqule usuku “Kuvuselelwe kokugcina”.

intro.body: Ngokusebenzisa i-Chatforia uyavuma le Migomo. Uma ungavumi, ungasebenzisi isevisi.

accounts.title: Ama-akhawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nikeza ulwazi olunembile futhi ugcine izinkomba zivikelekile.

acceptableUse.title: Ukusetshenziswa okugunyaziwe
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Akukho okuqukethwe okungekho emthethweni, okudlame, noma okwephulayo; akukho ugaxekile noma ukusetshenziswa okuzishintshayo.

yourContent.title: Okuqukethwe kwakho
yourContent.body: Usagcina amalungelo akuqukethwe kwakho. Usinika amalungelo adingekayo ukuze sisebenze isevisi (isb., ukudlulisa, ukugcina, ukuhumusha).

disclaimer.title: Izimemezelo & umthwalo wemfanelo
disclaimer.body: Isevisi inikezwa “njengoba injalo” ngaphandle kweziqinisekiso. Ngokwedlulele okuvunyelwe umthetho, i-Chatforia ayinakuba nomthwalo womonakalo ongaphandle noma olandelanayo.

changes.title: Izinguquko
changes.body: Singabuyekeza le migomo; ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa ngemva kwezinguquko kusho ukwamukela.

doNotSell.title: Ungathengisi noma Wabelane Ngolwazi Lwami Lomuntu Siqu
doNotSell.body: I-Chatforia ayithengisi ulwazi lomuntu siqu. Kepha izakhamuzi zaseCalifornia zisengafaka izicelo ngaphansi kwe-CPRA ngokuchofoza inkinobho engezansi.

cookies.title: Izilungiselelo Zamakhukhi
cookies.body: I-Chatforia isebenzisa amakhukhi ambalwa (isb., iseshini, ukuphepha). Asisebenzisi amakhukhi ezikhangiso ezivela kwelinye iqembu. Phatha amakhukhi kusethingi zibhrawuza yakho.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ayikho inombolo enikeziwe. Khetha ngekhowudi yendawo ukuze uqale ukuthumela imiyalezo.

startChatModal.title: Qala ingxoxo
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Thayipha igama, igama lomsebenzisi, ifoni, noma i-imeyili…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Thayipha igama lomsebenzisi noma ifoni bese uchofoza Sesha.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Okufakwe kwefoni/imeyili kuzotholakala emva kokuba usulondoloze njengoxhumana nabo.

sounds.freeNotice: Usekuhlelo Lwamahhala — imisindo ye-premium iyakhonjiswa kodwa ivaliwe. Thuthukisa ukuze uvule konke.

aiSettings.title: Izilungiselelo ze-AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Lawula ukuhumusha, izimpendulo ezihlakaniphile, nezimpendulo ezizenzakalelayo ze-ForiaBot.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Thumela imilayezo embalwa yokugcina (ehlungiwe) ku-AI ukuze iphakamise izimpendulo ezisheshayo.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Uma kuvuliwe, iziphakamiso ezibuya ku-AI zizofihlwa amagama aphawuliwe

accessibilitySettings.title: Ukufinyeleleka & Izexwayiso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Izinketho ezenza i-Chatforia ilungele ukusetshenziswa ngaphandle kokuncika emsindweni.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Iqala ngosayizi ojwayelekile. Yandisa uma uthanda umbhalo omkhulu kuzilungiselelo zokufinyeleleka.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Izexwayiso ezibonakalayo zemiyalezo & izingcingo
Khombisa amabhanela nokukhanya kwesihloko ukuze ungaphuthelwa umnyakazo.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Zamazama ngemiyalezo emisha (uma kusekelwa)
Vuselela ukuzamazama kwedivayisi ngezaziso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Khanyisa isikrini ngokufika kwengcingo
Ukukhanya okusheshayo lapho kukhala ucingo.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Humusha ngokuzenzakalela amanothi ezwi
Namathisela umbhalo wokusakaza kumilayezo ye-audio oyamukelayo.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Khombisa amabhanela nokukhanya kwesihloko ukuze ungaphuthelwa umnyakazo.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Gcina kuphela umbhalo obethelwe kuseva. Kucisha i-AI/Humusha kanye nokubuka kwangaphambi kokuhlunga.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Sesha nge-aliase, igama, igama lomsebenzisi, noma ifoni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Yabelana ngesixhumanisi sakho sememo ukuze uqale ingxoxo ngokushesha.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Hlala uxhumekile uhambile nge-Chatforia ye-iOS ne-Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Ithiphu: Imiyalezo yakho ihlala ivumelanisiwe phakathi kwe-web ne-mobile.

randomChat.title: Ingxoxo Engahleliwe
randomChat.description: Hlangana nomuntu omusha manje. Sizokunxeshezelisa sivule ikamelo lenkathi yesikhashana.
